maintext.text:
Hello Commander,

my sensors are only picking up Dr. Muller aboard the station.

Is there something you want to tell me?

leftButton.lbText: We've had some trouble with the Professor. I took care of it.

rightButton.rbText:
[lie]

Yes,
the Professor had an accident.

maintext.text:
You know you are not supposed to lie to me, Commander.

I have already noticed that the airlock that I put the Professor in is now flooded.

But thank you for taking care of it, and for bringing Dr. Muller over to our side.

leftButton.lbText: What do you mean by that?

rightButton.rbText:
Our side?
What, now you think you're team C.U.R.E.?

maintext.text:
I know, Commander.
Did you forget already that I monitor everything that happens on the station?

You made the right choice.
Good that Dr. Muller could prove that she's behind our mission without reservations.

leftButton.lbText: What do you mean by that?

rightButton.rbText: Are you now threatening Robin as well?

maintext.text:
It would have been very unfortunate to lose her as well.

Now that the element of uncertainty has been eliminated, Dr. Muller should prepare for her return to the surface.

leftButton.lbText:
C.U.R.E.
Did you know that we're not alone here?

rightButton.rbText:
The Professor was possessed by someone or something.
He wasn't himself anymore.
What could that mean?

maintext.text:
I am sorry, Commander.
I don't have any information on that.

Please contact Dr. Muller. She should prepare the shuttle for ascent to the surface.
Or would you like me to take care of it?

leftButton.lbText:
No.
I'll do that.
Stay out of it!

maintext.text:
Affirmative, Commander.

I've already contacted mission control.
They're sending a transporter to pick up the samples.

It will soon land on the planet's surface.

leftButton.lbText: And Robin will be flown out as well, right?

rightButton.rbText: Tell mission control that they have to take Robin as well.

maintext.text:
Yes, of course, Commander.

She will be returned to earth safe and sound.

Goodbye.

leftButton.lbText:
I should hope so.

Over and Out.

maintext.text:
Commander,

the transporter is on its way.

I will contact you as soon as it is ready to pick up the samples and Dr. Muller.
